DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim study quantify compare change lung volume ( measure functional residual capacity ) premature infant stable continuous positive airway pressure ( CPAP ) , randomize two additional week CPAP room air versus room air alone . We hypothesize infant randomize additional CPAP demonstrate increase functional residual capacity ( end two week study period prior discharge ) compare randomized room air .
